original_text: Now what was prepared at my expense for each day was one ox and six choice sheep and birds, and every ten days all kinds of wine in abundance. Yet for all this I did not demand the food allowance of the governor, because the service was too heavy on this people.
korean_text: 매일 나를 위하여 소 한 마리와 살진 양 여섯 마리를 준비하며 닭도 많이 준비하고 열흘에 한 번씩은 각종 포도주를 갖추었나니 비록 이같이 하였을지라도 내가 총독의 녹을 요구하지 아니하였음은 이 백성의 부역이 중함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Now what was prepared at my expense
for each day was one ox
and six choice sheep and birds
and every ten days all kinds of wine
I did not demand the food allowance of the governor
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 총독의 식량 비용을 요구하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: because the service was too heavy
